composition_rules.focus: Product centered and sharp with stable contact shadow; overlays arranged so CTA is visible in bottom 20% but product does not overlap text safe zone.
composition_rules.hierarchy: 1) Product 2) Price 3) CTA 4) Badges 5) Low-friction cue.
composition_rules.text_safe_zone: Reserve 10% margins on all sides. Top 0–10% for badges/headline; bottom 80–100% should be used for CTA and low-friction cues, but keep product clear of bottom 10% overlay area.
composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: Do not place product inside the bottom CTA area or overlap any overlay. Product must remain outside the 10% safe margins and never cover overlay text.
